http_applications.rules.match.label: When incoming requests match...
http_applications.rules.tooltip: Rule type cannot be changed. Create a new rule to create a different rule type.
http_applications.rules.modal.delete.bod: You are deleting the rule named %{name}. Deleting this rule will impact your traffic and cannot be undone.
The rule you are trying to delete is enabled. You must first disable it before you can delete it.
http_applications.empty_state.benefits.o: Manage configurations by their purpose rather than individual zones
http_applications.empty_state.benefits.t: Test changes safely via staging rules before going to production
http_applications.empty_state.descriptio: Manage configurations on the edge with versioning, staging, and rollbacks
